name: scrapify-dev/image-tool
description: Laravel package for image tools like Compress, Resize, Rotate.

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (shell_exec('npm -v 2>NUL')) { echo 'Installing Puppeteer...'.PHP_EOL; system('npm install puppeteer'); } else { echo 'Node.js not installed. Skipping Puppeteer installation.'.PHP_EOL; }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (shell_exec('npm -v 2>NUL')) { echo 'Updating Puppeteer...'.PHP_EOL; system('npm install puppeteer'); } else { echo 'Node.js not installed. Skipping Puppeteer installation.'.PHP_EOL; }"
